markdown.markdown: ::: footer R/Pharma 2023 - Icons by Lordicon.com ::: ## Housekeeping ::: {style="font-size: 80%;"} - General Guidelines - Terms and conditions - check the website at rinpharma.com/post/faq/. - R/Pharma is a non-commercial conference. Vendors are welcome to attend but as practicioners, not salespeople. - Please be patient with us - virtual is different. - Asking for help - Slack: reach out in the #help-me channel in rinpharmaconf (rinpharmaconf.slack.com) - Contact form on rinpharma.com - Reach out in the conference chat - Email to info@rinpharma.com ::: ## What is R/Pharma? - Volunteer organization of passionate R pacticioners in the Pharmaceutical and Biotech industries. - Annual meeting - Workshops, keynotes and general talks. - Started in 2018 (In person 2018, 2019. Virtual 2020->). - Want to help? Join our community. - email info@rinpharma.com to contribute. ## R/Pharma at posit::conf - R/Pharma held roundtable summit at posit::conf 2023. - 80 representatives for 45 companies contributed. - We'll be sharing discussions with the community shortly. {{< video assets/RPharma_Summit.mp4 height="400" title="True randomization">}} ## R/Pharma Workshops - 17 Workshops all free, put on by members of the community. - 4500 registrations, 1700 attendees, 76 countries - Credly Credentials for completion. ## R/Pharma Workshop Presenters :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="33%"} Rich Iannone Daniel Lee Allison Horst Alexandra Lauer Christina Fillmore Irene Vassallo Lyn Taylor Mega Chiang ::: ::: {.column width="33%"} Nicola Rennie Devin Pastoor Priyanka Gagneja Mutaz Jaber Will Landau Joanna Marques-Barros Daniel Sarbanes Bove Doug kelkhoff ::: ::: {.column width="33%"} Jose Sergio Hleap Lozano Ari Siggaard Knoph Ross Farrugia Dony Unardi Davide Garolini Martin Frigaard Shannon Hagerty Omar ElAshkar ::: :::: ## Brian Bole Award of Excellence ::: {style="font-size: 80%;"} - Brian Bole was an innovator and thought leader in the healthcare and life sciences space, working with R and an early adopter of shiny. - The Brian Bole Award of Excellence is presented annually in recognition of outstanding achievements in open source life sciences. - This year we're proud to present it to Anders Bilgrau, Ari Knoph, Steffen Larsen and the team at Novo Nordisk for their work on an R-Based Submission to the FDA. ::: ![](assets/abiu_hex.png){width=250} ![](assets/aikp_hex.png){width=250} ![](assets/sffl_hex.png){width=250} ## Brian Bole Award of Excellence :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="75%" style="font-size: 80%;"} - Brian Bole was an innovator and thought leader in the healthcare and life sciences space, working with R and an early adopter of shiny. - The Brian Bole Award of Excellence is presented annually in recognition of outstanding achievements in open source life sciences. - This year we're proud to present it to Anders Bilgrau, Ari Knoph, Steffen Larsen and the team at Novo Nordisk for their work on an R-Based Submission to the FDA. ::: ::: {.column width="25%"} ![](assets/abiu_hex.png) ![](assets/aikp_hex.png) ![](assets/sffl_hex.png) ::: :::: ## R/Pharma 2023 - Visit the **EXPO** to find out information on useful resources offered by the community. - R/Pharma **discussion panels**. Three panels - one at the end of each day. Today's panel will be Novo Nordisk taking questions on their R-based FDA submission (see slido tab on the right to enter/upvote questions to the panel). - **On-demand content**. Hosted on R/Pharma YouTube channel. ## Celebrating R/Pharma 2023 :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} #### R/Pharma Merchandise Store ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} #### Tweeting #rinpharma ![](assets/twitter-hashtag.png){width=50%} ::: :::: ## R/Pharma TidyTuesday - R/Pharma partnered with tidytuesday with a Pharma relevent dataset. Check out github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday for today's dataset. Build a visualization and tag it on social media with #TidyTuesday. ## Ad-hoc Meetings - Use the **sessions** capability of hopin to create a virtual room for meetings and discussions. - Presenters - this is a great way to follow-up on questions after your presentation. ## Thank You :::: {.columns} ::: {.column width="50%"} #### Advisory Groups - Metrum - Posit ::: ::: {.column width="50%"} #### Special Thank You - Nischal Shrestha (Posit) - Jon Harmon & Tracy Teal ::: ::::
